directions: Process cucumber, feta cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, milk, olive oil, garlic powder, salt, onion powder, and black pepper in a food processor until smooth.
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon onion powder, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
title: American-Style Creamy Greek Dressing
